predicate.note: Frames file for 'respect' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Mr. Bernstein , a tall , energetic man who [*T*-39] is widely respected as a publishing executive , has spent much of his time in recent years on human rights issues .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Instead , Mr. Bush and his aides made it clear [0] they respected Congress 's role and felt [0] they could work with the conservative Mr. Boren and the moderate Mr. Cohen [*-1] to iron out their differences .
